derivation.yuyuan_name: from German Schnaps, literally dram of liquor', from Low German and Dutch snaps 'mouthful'

entry.def: Schnapps is a strong alcoholic drink made from potatoes.

means.word_mean: 1. any of various strong liquors especially a Dutch spirit distilled from potatoes
